column1: SERVICE: A funeral service will be held at 11:00 AM Monday
column3: 2015 in the sanctuary of Englewood Baptist Church with Dr. Brent Lay
column4: Dr. Jim Patterson and Mr. Lee Benson officiating. Burial will follow in Highland Memorial Gardens. The family will receive friends on Monday from 10:00 AM until 11:00 AM prior to the service at Englewood.
